item.title: “Being Black often feels like my mind is straddling past,...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Being Black often feels like my mind is straddling past, present, and future all at once. The past never really leaves but rather hangs overhead like a shadow or a picture frame. For a young white person, segregation may seem like a concept buried many years in the past. For me, on the other hand, my own father couldn’t attend elementary school with white children until the fifth grade.”

https://saltyworld.net/why-being-black-means-time-is-fluid…/

"What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?"

saltyworld.net

Why Being Black Means Time is Fluid for Me

"What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?""What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?"

item.title: #keepgoing All images have black text on yellow background, and...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#keepgoing

All images have black text on yellow background, and the following text at the bottom: "Find out about all 10 roles at http://bit.ly/SocialChangeEcosystemMap. Attribution: Deepa Iyer, SoldarityIs and Building Movement Project.

Image description 1 - What is your role within #TheLongGame? Identifying your role within our social change ecosystem.

...

Image description 2 - Builder. "I develop, organize, and implement ideas, practices, people, and resources in service of a collective vision." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 3 - Caregiver. "I nurture and nourish the people around me by creating and sustaining a community of care, joy, and connection." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 4 - Disrupter. "I take uncomfortable and risky actions to shake up the status quo, to raise awareness, and to build power." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 5 - Experimenter. "I innovate, pioneer, and invent. I take risks and course-correct as needed." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 6 - Frontline Responder. "I address community crises by marshaling and organizing resources, networks, and messages." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 7 - Guide. "I teach, counsel, and advise, using my gifts of well-earned discernment and wisdom." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 8 - Healer. "I recognize and tend to the generational and current traumas caused by oppressive systems, institutions, policies, and practices." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 9 - Storyteller. "I craft and share our community stories, cultures, experiences, histories, and possibilities through art, music, media, and movement." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 10 - Visionary. "I imagine and generate our boldest possibilities, hopes and dreams, and remind us of our direction." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 11 - Weaver. "I see through-lines of connectivity between people, places, organizations, ideas and movements." -Deepa Iyer

Image description 12 - Image of infographic titled "Mapping our Roles in a Social Change Ecosystem (2020). Each role (weavers; experimenters; frontline responders; visionaries; builders; caregivers; disrupters; healers; storytellers; guides) is pictured in a colored circle, extending out from a center circle that contains the words "Equity; Liberation; Justice; Solidarity". Caption: All roles work together to fuel the momentum of our Social Change Ecosystem. Every role is necessary.

See More+8Imani Steven

Find your role.
Do your part.
#TheLongGame
Sipp Talk

...

Find out about all 10 roles at http://bit.ly/SocialChangeEcosystemMap
Attribution: Deepa Iyer, SolidarityIs and Building Movement Project

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

While the Colorado Department of Education and Denver7 erase the contributions of our brilliant, Black educators, we gon’ celebrate them. Use our comments to name Black educators in Denver and its surrounding areas who are going above and beyond for our kids and deserve to be on this list.

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280DiDi Delgado

They trying to act like we can't afford rent because of COVID, but we can't afford rent because of capitalism.

We don't need "COVID Relief" we need to abolish Capitalism. 🤸🏾‍♂️🤸🏾‍♂️🤸🏾‍♂️

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Shontel Lewis is with Shenika Carter and 4 others.Let me show you how allies show up! Our Sisters put a call out to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Shontel Lewis is with Shenika Carter and 4 others.

Let me show you how allies show up! Our Sisters put a call out to protect Black Women, specifically to protect one of the organizers of yesterday’s peaceful eve...nt, Shenika Carter.

I asked that we build our racial justice muscle and not remain silent when violent racial BS is occurring and endangering the life of a Black Woman. A life perpetually in danger.

The ask was to email the editor for this reckless, irresponsible, headline and attaching it to our Sister. Endangering her life.

This is how you use your power and your voice to Protect Black Women.

🖤

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
